department.dept_long_name: Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Advanced Russian for Academic Professional Communication
course.description: Emphasis on close reading and stylistic analysis of the Russian language with continued development of grammatical, sociolinguistic, strategic, and discourse competencies at an advanced level. Emphasis on reading with considerable practice in speaking, presenting, and writing for professional and academic purposes.
course.prerequisites: Russian 113, 114, or permission of the instructor.
